item.title: Various Artists - The Window Cleaner
item.description:
Ukulele play along
When I'm Cleaning Windows (In C) - George Formby
Using the chords: A7 C C7 Cdim7 D7 E7 F G G7
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU DU DU
Notes: This is a higher key than our other version.
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Various Artists - This Old Man He Played One
item.description:
For educational use.
This Old Man by eFlashApps. It’s been digitally slowed down 8% so young students can play along. The original may be found here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RKaxRYJ5AMY. It's in the key of C, so you can do it with diatonic Boomwhacker or diatonic color handbells.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Various Artists - Delilah
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Delilah - Tom Jones
Using the chords: A Am A7 C C7 Dm E7 F G G7 ** Don't be put off with lots of chords, they are all easy! **
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU DU - you need to count to 3
Notes: Try playing just D D D D etc. for the Intro and first few phrases then change to D DU DU
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Various Artists - On Top of Spaghetti
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Keys of C & D
As performed by Luigi
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
